name: Whimsical Dance of the Withered
title: Commander's Mask: Whimsical Dance of the Withered
desc: "In the end, all dreams shall merge into one, bringing ultimate salvation to all the people of the world."
in_play_description: After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill: Both sides' active characters gain 1 stack of Bond of Life. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill: Both sides' active characters gain 1 stack of Bond of Life. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
